## Call.postFeedback() method

Post feedback about a call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
postFeedback(score: Call.Score, issue: Call.Issue): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  score | [Call.Score](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_namespace.score_enum.md) | A score representing the serverity of the issue being reported. |
|  issue | [Call.Issue](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_namespace.issue_enum.md) | The issue being reported. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

- Resolves when the feedback has been posted.

## Example

To report that a call had very significant audio latency:

```
call.postFeedback(Call.Score.Five, Call.Issue.AudioLatency);
```
